sqlMap.select:
SELECT MER_SYS_ID ,MER_NAME ,MER_REG_NO ,MER_TAX_NO ,ORGANIZATION_CODE ,MER_REG_ADDR ,MER_LEGAL_PERSON ,MER_LEGAL_IDCARD ,REG_CAPITAL ,MER_KIND ,CONTACTOR ,CONTACTOR_PHONE ,CONTACTOR_ADDR ,CONTACTOR_EMAIL ,SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME ,SETT_ACCOUNT_NO ,SETT_AGENCY ,SIGN_DATE ,SIGN_PERSON ,DISP_NAME ,PLAT_MER_ID ,CREATE_TIME ,STATUS ,AUTH_STATUS ,LOGO ,COLOR ,BILL_CYCLE ,REMARK ,RESERVED ,SETT_ACC_TYPE ,ACCESS_TYPE ,MER_TYPE FROM MER_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND MER_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_REG_NO) Like '%'||(#mer_reg_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_TAX_NO) Like '%'||(#mer_tax_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORGANIZATION_CODE) Like '%'||(#organization_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_REG_ADDR) Like '%'||(#mer_reg_addr:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_LEGAL_PERSON) Like '%'||(#mer_legal_person:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_LEGAL_IDCARD) Like '%'||(#mer_legal_idcard:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REG_CAPITAL) Like '%'||(#reg_capital:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_KIND) Like '%'||(#mer_kind:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR) Like '%'||(#contactor:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR_PHONE) Like '%'||(#contactor_phone:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR_ADDR) Like '%'||(#contactor_addr:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR_EMAIL) Like '%'||(#contactor_email:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#sett_account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#sett_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_DATE) Like '%'||(#sign_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_PERSON) Like '%'||(#sign_person:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DISP_NAME) Like '%'||(#disp_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PLAT_MER_ID) =#plat_mer_id#
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AUTH_STATUS) Like '%'||(#auth_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOGO) Like '%'||(#logo:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COLOR) Like '%'||(#color:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BILL_CYCLE) Like '%'||(#bill_cycle:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACC_TYPE) Like '%'||(#sett_acc_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCESS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#access_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_TYPE) Like '%'||(#mer_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM MER_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND MER_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_REG_NO) Like '%'||(#mer_reg_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_TAX_NO) Like '%'||(#mer_tax_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORGANIZATION_CODE) Like '%'||(#organization_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_REG_ADDR) Like '%'||(#mer_reg_addr:VARCHAR#)||'%'

(MER_KIND) Like '%'||(#mer_kind:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR) Like '%'||(#contactor:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR_PHONE) Like '%'||(#contactor_phone:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR_ADDR) Like '%'||(#contactor_addr:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR_EMAIL) Like '%'||(#contactor_email:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#sett_account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#sett_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_DATE) Like '%'||(#sign_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_PERSON) Like '%'||(#sign_person:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DISP_NAME) Like '%'||(#disp_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PLAT_MER_ID) =#plat_mer_id#
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AUTH_STATUS) Like '%'||(#auth_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOGO) Like '%'||(#logo:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COLOR) Like '%'||(#color:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BILL_CYCLE) Like '%'||(#bill_cycle:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACC_TYPE) Like '%'||(#sett_acc_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
